name: Star Pig
description:
You're a Star Pig from planet Sty. Your rocket crashed and now you are stranded on a forest on a strange planet.
Try to assemble your rocket back while avoiding the local farmers who have mistaken you for a regular pig.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move. Follow the ingame tutorial for more instructions.

There are 3 levels of difficulty:

  • Easy: 3x3 grid
  • Normal: 4x4 grid
  • Hard: 5x5 grid

This is my first published game. It was developed in Monogame for the Miz Jam 1.

Credits:

  • Assets by Kenney: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
  • Assets recolored using Endesga 64 color palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/endesga-64
  • All sound effects and music by me.
  • Feel free to reuse any of my assets.

You can find the source code here: https://github.com/LuisMars/mizjam1
